title: Subtractor snake
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Subtractor snakes''' were a monster briefly considered for inclusion in ''Crawl''.  They were, in essence, fast and dangerous snakes with attacks similar to that of a [[Killer Klown]].  They mainly appeared in the Realm of Zot.  There was little to differentiate them from Klowns, so they were removed.

The name was likely a pun on [[adder]]s.

[[Category:Monsters]]
